overview: Flamenco guitar icon Paco de Lucía's Antología features 23 tracks spanning two discs, including "Sólo Quiero Caminar," "Río Ancho," "Zyryab," "Tio Sabas," "Chiquito," and "Entre Dos Aguas." The collection provides a nice balance between modern and traditional flamenco styles.
title: Paco de Lucía - Antología
